message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1150000.  I believe this is a fair price, considering its value to you.  Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of something more around $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a lower price, but $900000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1050000. This still offers you a good deal, but I need to ensure I get a reasonable return on my investment.  Let me know if you're interested in moving forward at this price.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1000000. This is the highest I can go, but I'm willing to compromise to get the deal done.
